name: @briebug/jest
description: Add jest to an Angular CLI project

scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.clean:launch: npm run clean && npm run launch
scripts.test: npm run clean:launch && npm run test:sandbox && npm run clean
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox && npm run lint && npm run test -- --no-cache && npm run e2e && npm run build
scripts.debug:
echo "debug not setup with @angular/schematics
> node --inspect-brk $(which schematics) .:addJest"

author: Briebug
